title: Leek quiche
ingredients: ['Pastry', '200g plain flour', '75g cold butter', '1 egg', '1 pinch of salt', 'Some cold water', 'Filling', '2-3 leeks', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 eggs', '250ml crème fraîche', '100g Gruyere cheese, grated', '50g Emmental cheese, grated', '50g cooked ham, diced', 'freshly ground white pepper', '1 pinch grated nutmeg']
